docker.name: RUN
docker.args: apk update &&     apk upgrade &&     apk add --update make rsync grep ca-certificates openssl wget
docker.raw: RUN apk update &&     apk upgrade &&     apk add --update make rsync grep ca-certificates openssl wget

docker.name: RUN
docker.args: wget "https://api.github.com/repos/dshearer/jobber/tarball/${JOBBER_VER}" -O jobber.tar.gz &&     echo "${SRC_HASH}  jobber.tar.gz" | sha256sum -cw &&     tar xzf *.tar.gz && rm *.tar.gz && mv dshearer-* jobber &&     cd jobber &&     make check &&     make install DESTDIR=/jobber-dist/
docker.raw: RUN wget "https://api.github.com/repos/dshearer/jobber/tarball/${JOBBER_VER}" -O jobber.tar.gz &&     echo "${SRC_HASH}  jobber.tar.gz" | sha256sum -cw &&     tar xzf *.tar.gz && rm *.tar.gz && mv dshearer-* jobber &&     cd jobber &&     make check &&     make install DESTDIR=/jobber-dist/

docker.name: RUN
docker.args: addgroup jobberuser &&     adduser -S -u "${USERID}" -G jobberuser jobberuser &&     mkdir -p "/var/jobber/${USERID}" &&     chown -R jobberuser:jobberuser "/var/jobber/${USERID}"
docker.raw: RUN addgroup jobberuser &&     adduser -S -u "${USERID}" -G jobberuser jobberuser &&     mkdir -p "/var/jobber/${USERID}" &&     chown -R jobberuser:jobberuser "/var/jobber/${USERID}"
